website_summaries.verdict: The Blu Pure XL is an affordable unlocked phablet with a premium build and powerful hardware, making it a compelling alternative to major flagships.
cons: Very large, even for phablet lovers

customer_reviews.title: Good...but not meant for heavy usage
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product if using the phone for calls, texts, or low key apps that don't use a lot of battery life. Also, the camera is pretty great. If however you use the phone for apps like Pokemon Go, the phone overheats and shuts off... Even at 70 percent charge. The sad thing is that it will also shut back off if you try to restart it. I'm not sure why that is, but the best solution is to keep it plugged into an external power source to keep it on. Other than the overheating and power issues its a decent phone.

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price, if you're on T-Mobile
customer_reviews.text: Likes: price, double SIM capability (two phone no's on one phone), large screen size with really good resolution, thin phone, good media handling. Dislikes: battery dies daily, poor speaker (can't hear ringer), only generic app availability, poor WAN scanning, poor WIFI switching, poor cell region switching. Seems to hang on to existing comm resources regardless of the strength of other signals nearby and switching to stronger sources when the existing signal is no longer viable.

customer_reviews.title: I bought this phone over a year ago and..
customer_reviews.text: To date the blu pure xl has been a good phone for $350 at the time i bought it. I would have given it 5 starts if priced from $199-$250. The screen is very sharp and the response is great with an 8 core processor. The pictures look very good front and back as long as you have steady hands and good lighting. The lcd screen is durable and doesn't scratch that easily. I wish they would upgrade android already! It feels dated! It runs on android 5.1 and it uses a BLU theme that I don't like. They would have been better off leaving it stock, but that's my opinion. Overall I am happy with the BLU pure XL.
